channel.title: Shops tele dont work!
channel.description:
Look i made a normal account and it wont work but it works on my owner
[IMG]http://i38.tinypic.com/azfbew.gif[/img]
im using triforce-scape client please help!!!!!
Ok just fixed home i need to fix shops

item.title: Shops tele dont work!
item.dc:creator: @king_gauge king gauge
item.description:
@king_gauge wrote:

Oh, thats a command, meaning you need to do the ::shop in order to go there… for the button go into your action buttons and look for the shop one and make sure it says

teleportToX = 2729; teleportToY = 3477;
And if that is there, make sure that it doesn’t say what i said it had before.[quote=“king gauge, post:2, topic:310416”]Well, make sure that the action button that leads to shops isn’t for like a donator or mod +

After all the button stuff: && playerRights (>)(<)(=) (1)(2)(3)))

or something like that… not exactly what it would be… () are meaning that it could be whats inside those.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Shops tele dont work!
item.dc:creator: @samtherule samtherule
item.description:
@samtherule wrote:

[quote=“king gauge, post:2, topic:310416”]Well, make sure that the action button that leads to shops isn’t for like a donator or mod +

After all the button stuff: && playerRights (>)(<)(=) (1)(2)(3)))

or something like that… not exactly what it would be… () are meaning that it could be whats inside those.[/quote]
i dont know how to check that i mean i fiex the home button like that cus it was set to owner but do i go in source files or client and release a new client? and heres the code } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("shop")) { if (teleblock == true) { sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); // made by Mod Allstar } else { teleportToX = 2729; teleportToY = 3477; sendMessage( "You teleport to the shop!"); }

should i just add the thing you toled me?

Read full topic

item.title: Shops tele dont work!
item.dc:creator: @king_gauge king gauge
item.description:
@king_gauge wrote:

Well, make sure that the action button that leads to shops isn’t for like a donator or mod +

After all the button stuff: && playerRights (>)(<)(=) (1)(2)(3)))

or something like that… not exactly what it would be… () are meaning that it could be whats inside those.
